2 Machabees *__06.2__That in Gazarim: : Viz., the temple of the Samaritans. And as they were originally strangers, the name of Hospitalis (which signifies of or belonging to strangers) was applicable to the idol set up in their temple.
2 Machabees *__06.21__Wicked pity: : Their pity was wicked, inasmuch as it suggested that wicked proposal of saving his life by dissimulation.
